title: No man ever wetted clay
post_text: And then left it, as if it would become brick by chance and fortune.

title: Normal people
post_text: believe that if it ain't broke, don't fix it. Engineers believe that if it ain't broke, it doesn't have enough features yet

title: To err is human
post_text: but to really foul things up you need a computer

title: The good thing about computers
post_text: They do what you tell them to do. The bad news is that they do what you tell them to do.
